technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant mentions that he has had COVID three times, but does not express any negative affect about it in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentions that he was hospitalized with COVID, but does not express any strong negative affect about it.
communal_orientation: The participant answers the questions and engages in the conversation, but does not go out of his way to connect with the conversation partner.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and answers the questions, but does not go out of his way to keep the conversation going.
defensiveness: The participant does not display any defensiveness in justifying his beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant states that he got the vaccine because it was required for his job, but does not express a strong belief in its importance.
booster_importance: The participant states that he does not think boosters are necessary because he has had COVID so many times.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a low amount of cognitive complexity, as he does not engage in much consideration, analysis, or recognition of nuance.
general_notes: The participant seems to have a negative view of the vaccine and boosters, but is not strongly opposed to them. He seems to believe that he has natural immunity from having had COVID multiple times.
